artifacts.config.client.cooldownOverlayO: Location of the artifact cooldown gui element
Distance from the hotbar measured in pixels
Negative values place the element left of the hotbar
artifacts.config.client.enableCooldownOv: Whether artifacts on cooldown should be displayed next to the hotbar
artifacts.config.client.heliumFlamingoOv: Controls the vertical position of the Helium Flamingo's charge meter
artifacts.config.client.showFirstPersonG: Whether models for gloves are shown in first person
artifacts.config.client.showTooltips.des: Whether artifacts have tooltips explaining their effects
artifacts.config.client.title: Client
artifacts.config.client.useModdedMimicTe: Whether mimics can use textures from Lootr or Quark
artifacts.config.cooldown.title: Cooldown
artifacts.config.enabled.title: Enabled
artifacts.config.general.archaeologyChan: The chance that an artifact generates in suspicious sand or gravel
Affects how common artifacts are in chests
Values above 1 will make artifacts rarer, values between 0 and 1 will make artifacts more common
Doubling this value will make artifacts approximately twice as hard to find, and vice versa
To prevent artifacts from appearing as chest loot, set this to 10000.
artifacts.config.general.campsite.allowL: Whether campsites can contain blocks that emit light
artifacts.config.general.campsite.campsi: How many times a campsite will attempt to generate per chunk
Set this to 0 to prevent campsites from generating
artifacts.config.general.campsite.maxY.d: The maximum height campsites can spawn at
artifacts.config.general.campsite.mimicC: The probability that a campsite has a mimic instead of a chest
artifacts.config.general.campsite.minY.d: The minimum height campsites can spawn at
artifacts.config.general.campsite.title: Campsite
artifacts.config.general.campsite.useMod: Whether to use wooden chests from other mods when generating campsites
artifacts.config.general.entityEquipment: The chance that a skeleton, zombie or piglin spawns with an artifact equipped
artifacts.config.general.title: General
artifacts.config.generateAsLoot.descript: Whether this item can be found in structures or drop from entities

Values between -1 and 0 reduce the player's scale
Values above 0 increase the player's scale

Increases damage dealt by the wearer

Decreases the time it takes to drink items
Decreases the time it takes to eat items
Reduces fall damage taken by the wearer
Increases the wearer's flatulence
Increases the length of invincibility after taking damage
Increases the wearer's jump height
Grants immunity to knockback
Increases the wearer's maximum health
Increases the speed of ridden mounts
Increases the wearer's walking speed on snow
Increases the time the wearer can stay underwater
Increases the wearer's maximum safe fall distance
Shrinks the wearer
Makes ice less slippery to walk on
Increases the wearer's movement speed while sprinting
Increases the wearer's step height while sprinting
Improves agility in water
Increases the wearer's mining speed
Increases experience dropped by creatures
Decreases the trading prices of villagers

artifacts.tooltip.ability.mob_effects.wa: Allows the wearer to breathe underwater
